b.i: Spin and Tell
SPIN
RED Sector Word: Fights Question: What are your secret fights?
BLACK Sector Word: Hero/Heroine Question: Who do you look up to?
GREY Sector Word: Body Question: Favourite part of your body?
RED Sector Word: Decision Question: What\'s the worst decision you\'ve ever made?
BLACK Sector Phrase: Food brand Question: What is your favourite food brand?
Grey Sector Word: Faith Question: Do you believe in God?
RED Sector Word: Spender Question: Explain your spending habit?
BLACK Sector Word: hairstyle Question: What\'s your favourite hairstyle?
GREY Sector Word: Fights Question: Explain the feeling of overcoming/winning?
RED Sector Phrase: Spin again Spin
BLACK Sector Word: Blank Blank
GREY Sector Word: Animal Question: What is your favourite animal?
RED Sector Phrase: Biggest regrets Question: What regrets have ?
BLACK Sector Word: moment Prompt: Recount your best moment ever!
GREY Sector Word: Wisdom Question: Wisdom or wealt
RED Sector Phrase: Miss a turn
BLACK Sector Word: Song Question: What\'s your favourite song and why? Prompt: Sing a Song
GREY Sector Word: Wealth Question: What\'s your definition of wealth
RED Sector Phrase: Greatest fear Question: What\'s your greatest fear and why? Prompt: Advise
BLACK Sector Word: Movie Question: What\'s your favourite movie?
GREY Sector Word: Vacation Prompt: Recount your best vacation
RED Sector Phrase: Biggest challenge Question: What\'s the biggest challenge you\'ve ever faced? Prompt: Tell how you handled it
BLACK Sector Word: Friend Question: Who\'s a friend to you?
GREY Sector Word: Food Question: What\'s your favourite food? Prompt: Tell recipe if you know!
RED Sector Phrase: Light or Darkness Prompt: Choose
BLACK Sector Word: Song Question: what can or can\'t you do by yourself?
GREY Sector Word: Song Prompt: Recount your best decision ever
RED Sector Word: Childhood Prompt: Recount best and worst childhood days!
BLACK Sector Word: Uneasiness Question: What makes you uneasy?
GREY Sector Word: Menu Question: What\'s you favourite restaurant menu
RED Sector Phrase: Worst day Prompt: Tell your worst day
BLACK Sector Word: Book Question: What\'s your favourite book and why?
GREY Sector Phrase: Don\'t tell Prompt: Do not tell
